## Importing/Processing Data

```{r, message=FALSE}
data <- read_csv("sales_revenue_clean.csv")
```
## Custom functions

#### Plot function
```{r}
plot_months <- function(series,  main = "title", ylab = "value", xlab = "Time") {
  Month=c('J','F','M','A','M','J','J','A','S','O','N','D')
  
  plot(series, main = main, ylab = ylab, xlab = xlab)
  points(series,pch=Month)
}
```

#### Series diagnostics
```{r}
stationary_test <- function(series){
  acf(series)
  pacf(series)
  print(runs(series))
  print(shapiro.test(series))
}
```

```{r}
totalRev <- ts(data$Tot_Revenue/1000000,start=c(1990,1),frequency=12)
plot_months(totalRev, main = "Total Revenue (1990-2020)", ylab = "Revenue (Millions)", xlab = "Year")
```

```{r}
totalRev2 = window(totalRev, start = c(2008, 1))


# hold actual data for later predictions
actual = window(totalRev2, start = c(2019,1))
totalRev2 = window(totalRev2, start = c(2008,2), end = c(2019,1))

plot_months(totalRev2, main = "Total Revenue (2008-2019)", ylab = "Revenue (Millions)", xlab = "Year")


```

```{r}
acf(totalRev2, main = "ACF of Total Revenue (2008-2020)")
pacf(totalRev2)

```


```{r}
# bc = BoxCox.ar(totalRev2)
```


```{r}
recRev = totalRev2^(-1)
actual = actual^(-1)

plot_months(recRev, main = "Transformed Revenue (2008-2020)", ylab = "1/Revenue", xlab = "Year")
acf(recRev)
pacf(recRev)

```



```{r}
diffRev = diff(recRev)
plot_months(diffRev, main = "First Difference of Transformed Revenue", ylab = "First Difference of Transformed Revenue", xlab = "Year")
```


```{r}
seasDiffRev = diff(diffRev, lag = 12)
plot_months(seasDiffRev, main = "First Non-Seasonal and Seasonal Difference of Transformed Revenue", ylab = "First Non-Seasonal and Seasonal Difference", xlab = "Year")
acf(seasDiffRev)
pacf(seasDiffRev)
```


```{r}
eacf(seasDiffRev)
plot(armasubsets(seasDiffRev, nar = 12, nma = 12))
```


```{r}
model1 = arima(recRev, order = c(0,1,1), seasonal = list(order=c(0,1,1),period= 12))
model2 = arima(recRev, order = c(1,1,1), seasonal = list(order=c(0,1,1),period= 12))

model3 = arima(recRev, order = c(0,1,1), seasonal = list(order=c(1,1,1),period= 12))
model4 = arima(recRev, order = c(1,1,1), seasonal = list(order=c(1,1,1),period= 12))

```

model4

```{r}

model = arima(recRev, order = c(0,1,0), seasonal = list(order=c(0,1,1),period= 12))
plot(fitted(model2), col = 'red')
lines(recRev, pch = 3)
plot(fitted(model4), col = 'green')
lines(recRev, pch = 3)

model <- model2

```

```{r}
num = length(actual)
res = plot(model,n.ahead=num, n1 = c(2016,2), col = "red", main = "ARIMA(1,1,1)x(0,1,1)_12 Forecast", ylab ="1/Revenue", xlab = "Year")
lines(actual,pch=3) 
abline(h=coef(model)[names(coef(model))=='intercept'])
```

```{r}
num = length(actual)
res = plot(model,n.ahead=36, col = "red", main = "Beyond 2020", ylab = "1/Revenue", xlab = "Year")
abline(h=coef(model)[names(coef(model))=='intercept'])
```
